definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Mayo stood before the automatic door of the Toritsu Chuuou library.
sentences.chinese: 现在，真夜正站在国家图书馆的正门前。

sentences.english: Four golden characters meaning "Cultural Site of Shaolin" are carved above the stone archway.
sentences.chinese: 石坊正门前额刻着“少林胜迹”四个金色大字。

sentences.english: The portal of the mansion looks magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 这座大厦的正门看上去富丽堂皇。

sentences.english: Ho Chi Minh Museum. Main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 胡志明博物馆的正门口。

sentences.english: Chinese lanterns hang from the ceilings of the main entrance hall.
sentences.chinese: 在正门入口处，大红的中国灯笼高高悬挂着。

sentences.english: Look , this is the frontispiece of the university.
sentences.chinese: 看，这就是西大校园的正门。

sentences.english: Do not open the main gate, the only thing some people out of Liangjiao door.
sentences.chinese: 正门却不开，只有东西两角门有人出入。

sentences.english: No one ever found out how he had managed to get into the courtyard without opening the big gates.
sentences.chinese: 别人永远没有知道他怎样能不开正门便到了天井里。

sentences.english: But not into the main gate, only into the west Jiaomen.
sentences.chinese: 却不进正门，只进了西边角门。

sentences.english: The Front Gate of Taihoku Imperial University.
The front door of the Manor was unlocked.
Metro Line 5 station and the community close the main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 地铁五号线车站与社区正门近在咫尺。

sentences.english: He drove right up to the front door .
sentences.chinese: 他把车子直开到正门前。

sentences.english: Miriam continued, 'There is a big panel at the door.
sentences.chinese: 米里亚姆继续说道，“正门上有个很大的控制面板。

sentences.english: However, apart from the high walls and the main gate, there are no prison bars.
sentences.chinese: 但是，监狱中只有高墙和正门，没有栅栏。

sentences.english: There's a big sign in front of it.
sentences.chinese: 酒家正门挂着一块很大的招牌。

the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
Qianmen subway station on Beijing Subway Line 2
front door/main entrance/honest and upright approach (as opposed to 後門|后门, back-door or under the counter)
a screen wall across the gate of a house (for privacy)

main hall of a Buddhist temple
